tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS). The `Series` method in the `serverAsClient` struct incurs goroutine leaks when the request is stopped due to a context cancellation.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/thanos-io/thanos` library to the patch version.
